data.title: Geometric Textured Structured Mini Handheld Bag with Quilted Detail
data.description: GUESSGeometric Textured Structured Mini Handheld Bag with Quilted Detail3.8|5 RatingsMRP₹ 9999Price DetailsMaximum Retail PriceRs. 9999(Incl. of all taxes)DiscountSelling PriceRs. 9999(Incl. of all taxes)inclusive of all taxesThis product is currently sold outOUT OF STOCKWISHLIST100% Original ProductsPay on delivery is not availableEasy 3 days returns and exchangesProduct DetailsProduct Details Black geometric textured mini handheld bag with quilted detail1 main compartment, has a zip closure, 1 inner zip pocket, and 3 cardholdersTablet sleeve: noOne handle with a detachable sling strapSize & FitHeight: 11 cmWidth: 19 cmDepth: 7 cmMaterial & Care100% PUWipe with a clean and dry cloth to remove dustSpecificationsTypeHandheld BagSizeSmallCompartment ClosureZipPrint or Pattern TypeGeometricSurface StylingQuiltedHandlesOne HandleSling StrapDetachable Sling StrapOccasionCasualSee MoreRatings3.85 Verified Buyers53431211Customer Reviews (1)3The size is smaller than the pictures and for that the price is high.I like this brand and have a tote bag of guess too but that’s worth the price I feel being bigger in size with multiple compartments.Aditii Arya Sharma18 June 202420Product Code: 27304504
